View My Research Contact Me

About Me

An ecological researcher specializing in Ecological Informatics with a strong foundation in Wildlife Conservation and Management. Currently pursuing a Master's in Ecology at Kerala University of Digital Sciences, Innovation and Technology, combining ecological knowledge with modern computational approaches.

Experienced in biodiversity assessment and field research, with technical proficiency in R, Python, and GIS. Passionate about using data-driven approaches for wildlife conservation, ecosystem restoration, and sustainable development, seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative research projects in ecological science.

Broad Interests

Wildlife Conservation Ecosystem Restoration Sustainable Development

Research & Projects

Bird Species Identification with Regional Custom CNN Model

January 2025 - Present

Shillim Institute Conservation Fellow | Northern Western Ghats, India

Spearheaded a project on bird species identification using a custom ResNet50-based CNN model to evaluate restoration success in the Northern Western Ghats' Pavana Dam Catchment.

  • Deployed AudioMoth devices across 22 sites to analyze distributions of 14 bird species
  • Achieved 92.95% model accuracy in species classification
  • Correlated acoustic data with habitat types to advance conservation strategies
  • Applied ecological informatics to assess restoration success metrics
Acoustic Monitoring Deep Learning Species Identification Data Analysis Habitat Assessment GIS Analysis

Land Use and Land Cover Change Analysis

June 2024

Kannoth Padam, Thrissur, Kerala

Conducted comprehensive analysis of land use and land cover changes in Kannoth Padam, Thrissur, Kerala from 2014 to 2024 using geospatial techniques and satellite imagery.

  • Assessed spatial distribution of five primary land cover categories
  • Utilized high-resolution satellite imagery for accurate change detection
  • Documented changes in villages, mountains, rocks, crops, trees, and rivers
  • Prepared detailed reports on land cover transitions and environmental impacts
GIS Analysis Remote Sensing Satellite Imagery Environmental Assessment

Smart India Hackathon 2024

September 2024

Innovation Club DUK | Punjab Skill Development Mission

Participated in the national-level Smart India Hackathon, an initiative by the Ministry of Education's Innovation Cell, addressing challenges in Smart Education for the Punjab Skill Development Mission.

  • Designed and developed a freelancing platform connecting freelancers with employers
  • Implemented tools for efficient project management and skill matching
  • Gained hands-on experience in full-stack web application development
  • Collaborated in a team environment to deliver a functional prototype
Web Development Project Management UI/UX Design Team Collaboration

Awards & Achievements

Shillim Institute Conservation Fellowship

Shillim Institute

Secured the Shillim Institute Conservation Fellowship during my Master's program to support dissertation research. Developed a CNN model for detecting pre-trained species in soundscape audio recordings using a supervised learning framework, customizable for specific target species, to enhance conservation efforts.

January 2025

University Level Sports

Kerala University of Digital Sciences, Innovation and Technology

  • Mixed Doubles Table Tennis: 1st Place, University Level Intramural House Competitions, 2024

  • Men's Cricket: 3rd Place, University Level Intramural House Competitions, 2024
2024

Two Day Water Budgeting Workshop

Unnat Bharat Abhiyan, Digital University Kerala

As part of the Unnat Bharat Abhiyan programme at Digital University Kerala, I attended a two-day workshop where experts explained about water budgeting for a panchayat with a case study of Pothencode Panchayath.

March 2024

Poster Presentation

National Seminar on "Recent Trends in Biological Research and Career Prospects"

Presented a poster titled "Antibiotic Resistance bacteria: Klebsiella pneumoniae" in a National Seminar on "Recent Trends in Biological Research and Career Prospects" held at Shivaji College, University of Delhi.

September 2019 Shivaji College, University of Delhi

Field Experience

Bird and Butterfly Survey

Thirunalveli

2023

Participated in a field visit organized by the Ashoka Trust for Research in Ecology and the Environment (ATREE), gaining valuable insights into species identification and data collection techniques.

  • Conducted field surveys in the unique ecosystem of Tirunelveli's Dry Thorn Forest
  • Learned advanced techniques for bird and butterfly identification
  • Participated in systematic data collection and documentation
Species Identification Field Survey Data Collection Ecosystem Assessment

Wetland Species Assessment

Digital University Kerala Campus

2023

Contributed to an ongoing research project documenting species diversity in the wetland ecosystem, coordinated by the School of Informatics at Digital University Kerala, to create a comprehensive biodiversity inventory.

  • Conducted biodiversity surveys in wetland habitats
  • Documented various species and their ecological roles
  • Participated in data analysis and documentation
Biodiversity Assessment Wetland Ecology Species Documentation Research Collaboration

Acoustic Data Collection

Pavana Dam, Maharashtra

2024

Collected acoustic data from both degraded and restored habitats in the Pavana Dam area as part of a research project on ecosystem restoration and biodiversity assessment.

  • Deployed and maintained acoustic monitoring equipment
  • Collected field data on avian biodiversity
  • Compared acoustic signatures between different habitat types
  • Contributed to research on habitat restoration effectiveness
Acoustic Monitoring Field Research Habitat Assessment Data Collection
